ECSchema.description: Views that introduce derived concepts based on the StormSewerPhysical schema.

ECEntityClass.description: View that adds derived properties to the definition of a Pipe.

QueryView.Query: SELECT [pg].[ECInstanceId], [pg].[ECClassId], pow(pow([pg].[MaxX] - [pg].[MinX], 2) + pow([pg].[MaxY] - [pg].[MinY], 2) + pow([pg].[MaxZ] - [pg].[MinZ], 2), 0.5) [Length], abs([pg].[MaxZ] - [pg].[MinZ]) / (pow(pow([pg].[MaxX] - [pg].[MinX], 2) + pow([pg].[MaxY] - [pg].[MinY], 2) + pow([pg].[MaxZ] - [pg].[MinZ], 2), 0.5)) [Slope] FROM (SELECT [p].[ECInstanceId], [p].[ECClassId], MIN([pp].[Origin].[X]) [MinX], MIN([pp].[Origin].[Y]) [MinY], MIN([pp].[Origin].[Z]) [MinZ], MAX([pp].[Origin].[X]) [MaxX], MAX([pp].[Origin].[Y]) [MaxY], MAX([pp].[Origin].[Z]) [MaxZ] FROM [pipphys].[Pipe] [p] INNER JOIN [pipphys].[PipingPort] [pp] ON [pp].[Parent].[Id] = [p].[ECInstanceId] GROUP BY [p].[ECInstanceId] HAVING COUNT(*) = 2) [pg]

ECEntityClass.description: View that adds derived properties to the definition of a PipingPort.

QueryView.Query: SELECT [pp].[ECInstanceId], [pp].[ECClassId], CASE WHEN ([cpt].[ECInstanceId] IS NOT NULL) THEN ([pp].[Origin].[Z] + (([cpt].[InnerDiameter] / 2) * cos([pp].[Pitch]))) WHEN ([rpt].[ECInstanceId] IS NOT NULL) THEN ([pp].[Origin].[Z] + (([rpt].[SmallerDimension] / 2) * cos([pp].[Pitch]))) ELSE NULL END [CrownElevation], CASE WHEN ([cpt].[ECInstanceId] IS NOT NULL) THEN ([pp].[Origin].[Z] - (([cpt].[InnerDiameter] / 2) * cos([pp].[Pitch]))) WHEN ([rpt].[ECInstanceId] IS NOT NULL) THEN ([pp].[Origin].[Z] - (([rpt].[SmallerDimension] / 2) * cos([pp].[Pitch]))) ELSE NULL END [InvertElevation], NAVIGATION_VALUE(stmswrphysViews.PipingPortView.Parent, [pp].[Parent].[Id]), NAVIGATION_VALUE(stmswrphysViews.PipingPortView.TypeDefinition, [pp].[TypeDefinition].[Id]) FROM [pipphys].[PipingPort] [pp] INNER JOIN [pipphys].[PipingPortType] [ppt] ON [pp].[TypeDefinition].[Id] = [ppt].[ECInstanceId] LEFT JOIN [pipphys].[CircularPortType] [cpt] ON [ppt].[ECInstanceId] = [cpt].[ECInstanceId] LEFT JOIN [pipphys].[RectangularPortType] [rpt] ON [ppt].[ECInstanceId] = [rpt].[ECInstanceId]

ECProperty.description: Elevation of the inside top of the PipingPort
Elevation of the inside bottom of the PipingPort

ECNavigationProperty.description: The parent bis:Element that owns this PipingPort.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship between an IPipingElement and its Ports.
A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific PipingPort is an instance of the defined PipingPortType
